text.0: let brahmans and aṅgirases come forward and let the roar of cloudy heaven surround us.
text.1: loud low the milchkine swimming in the waters set be the stones that grace our holy service.
text.2: fair agni is thy longknown path to travel yoke for the juice tfiy bay thy ruddy horses.
text.3: or red steeds herobearing for the chamber seated i call the deities generations.
text.4: they glorify your sacrifice with worship yet the glad priest near them is left unequalled.
text.5: bring the gods hither thou of many aspects turn hitherward aramati the holy.
text.6: what time the guest hath made himself apparent at ease reclining in the rich mans dwelling.
text.7: agni wellpleased wellplaced within the chamber gives to a house like this wealth worth the choosing.
text.8: accept this sacrifice of ours o agni glorify it with indra and the maruts.
text.9: here on our grass let night and dawn be seated bring longing varuṇa and mitra hither.
text.10: thus hath vasiṣṭha praised victorious agni yearning for wealth that giveth all subsistence.
text.11: may he bestow on us food strength and riches preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
